meanings.definition: The part of a gear tooth that extends beyond the pitch circle and meshes with the gear teeth of another gear.
meanings.sent1: The dedendum of the gear tooth ensures smooth interaction with neighboring gears.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the dedendum of each gear tooth is properly aligned for efficient operation.
meanings.sent3: The dedendum of the gear tooth decided to throw a party for the neighboring teeth.
meanings.sent4: The dedendum of the gear tooth reached out like a friendly handshake to the adjacent gears.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dedendum of the gear tooth stood out like a welcoming beacon.

meanings.definition: The amount by which a gear tooth extends beyond the pitch circle.
meanings.sent1: Check the dedendum measurement to ensure proper gear tooth engagement.
meanings.sent2: The dedendum of the gear tooth determines the gear meshing quality.
meanings.sent3: The dedendum measurement decided to take a vacation beyond the pitch circle.
meanings.sent4: The dedendum of the gear tooth stretched out like a curious cat exploring beyond its usual limits.
meanings.sent5: The precise dedendum measurement is crucial for gear performance.
